title: What is an electronic device? - Quora

response.answer_text: The device which contains semiconductor circuit inside it, is called electronic device. There are two types: Electrical Device: The device which does not use semiconductor circuits inside it, but uses only passive electrical components like coil, resistor, capacitor, etc.Electronic Device: The device which contains semiconductor circuits as the main elements alongwith supporting components like resistors, capacitors, etc.
